html.explanation: HTML is an acronym that stands for HyperText Markup Language, which is used for creating web pages and web applications.

html.questionText: 2) The correct sequence of HTML tags for starting a webpage is
html.explanation: The correct sequence of HTML tags to start a webpage is html, head, title, and body.

html.questionText: 3) Which of the following element is responsible for making the text bold in HTML?
html.explanation: The <b> (bold tag) tag in HTML is used to display the written text in bold format.

html.questionText: 4) Which of the following tag is used for inserting the largest heading in HTML
html.explanation: The <h1> tag is used to insert the main heading or the highest level heading.t

html.questionText: 5) Which of the following tag is used to insert a line-break in HTML?
html.explanation:
The
tag in the HTML document is used to create a line break in a text. If we place the
tag in HTML code, then it works the same as pressing the enter key in a word processor.
